response.original_title: In This Moment, I'm Living: Ease
response.overview: Thefuries is another face of a practicing artist. They make music for the tranquillity of the souls of survivors of sexual violence: requiems for the living, the living dead and the dead. In This Moment I'm Living is a wider project that uses sound to surface how trauma changes the way survivors listen. In restructuring sounds and engaging in a process of healing, Thefuries hopes that the listener can experience the work with moments of ease and see the strength of vulnerability. In This Moment, Iâ€™m Living: Ease is a spell blurring the human with the non-human, calling an end to sexual violence.
response.title: In This Moment, I'm Living: Ease
